title: She is Brave
description: The second book in the series. There's something suspicious going on at the nearby pharmaceutical company... and Becks decides to investigate. It's not long before Lincoln Cline discovers what she's up to and brings in the Assist Security team - whether she likes it or not. Tempers rise and passion ignites in the second book from the 'She is' series. Standalone, but previous characters make an appearance.Free on Kobo.
author: Suzanna Stone
